desc: Naturally beautiful knitting & weaving yarns and wool products. Produced at our modern mill & wool centre, Inspired by the stunning surroundings of Scotland's Outer Hebrides.

layout.text: A very warm Fàilte to the world of Uist Wool. Discover our range of natural undyed yarns & beautiful wool products, produced at our modern mill & wool centre and inspired by the stunning surroundings of Scotland’s Outer Hebrides.
